value:
$WmMPID_ジスト,ch08_14_Xyst_M_Normal,Face|The name's Gerik. I'm the leader of a
band of mercenaries. Seems we're on
opposite sides of this thing, for now...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Eir? Are you all right?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|I'm...fine. Why do you ask?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You look like you're in pain.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Listen... It's going to be all right.
The fighting will be over soon.$k$pAnd after it's done, you can come
back with us to Askr!$k$pYou'd like that, wouldn't you? I can
show you all around the castle.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Oh! And I'll take you to my favorite
spot for stargazing! Doesn't that
sound nice?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You say...the same things...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|Forgive me—it's nothing. Thank you,
Princess Sharena.$k$p

$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|...$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|$Fi2000|We're setting out to defeat Hel,
Princess. This will be the final battle.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|No—please, stop. You cannot
possibly hope to defeat my mother...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We can. But what we cannot do is ask
you to fight her yourself. Instead, we
ask that you trust us and stay behind.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Just wait here, OK? We'll be back
before you know it.$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Hey, it's OK. Remember what I said?$k$p$EFace_Smile|When this is all over, we'll go back to
Askr. We'll go stargazing on my
favorite hill. All right?$k$p$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Do you promise?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Absolutely.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Without a doubt!$k$p$Fo2000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_神階エイル,ch00_20_Eir_F_Normal,Face|$Fi2000|Princess Sharena...
My mother killed her.$k$pPrince Alfonse made a pact with
Mother...to bring his sister back.$k$p$EFace_Pain|I was powerless to stop it,
$Nu...$k$pThere was nothing I could do...$k$p$Sbs150|
